item.title: Researching Twitter Magic
item.description:
:::::: entry-content :::: {.zemanta-img style=“margin: 1em; display: block;”} ::: {}

{decoding=“async” height=“49” width=“210”}
Image via CrunchBase ::: ::::

Whether you love it, hate it or otherwise, there is something unique enabled through Twitter{.zem_slink rel=“homepage”}. I think there is something interesting and potentially powerful happening and seem to have ranted well enough to get the interest of Dr. Frances Westley, co-author of Getting to Maybe – How the World is Changed, a member of Social Innovation Generation, and the Chair of Social Innovation at University of Waterloo. Frances asked me to articulate my hunches from which we’ll see what might be the most interesting research questions that someone from her team could dig in to.
